dmca.title: US Registered Trademark Infringement
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam, 

It has come to my attention that a domain -  xxxhotbitches.info  - that is hosted by Layered Technologies on the IP - 72.36.177.58 -  contains elements that are direct infringements of  our US Registered Trademark. 

Namely the text 

trademark infringement, copyright infringement and DMCA policy ... 
Outline and policy in regards to trademarks and copyright infringement ... Trademark , Copyright and DMCA Information. dangerdave is a US Registered Trademark - (Serial Number . 

and other elements within the page - http://xxxhotbitches.info/dangerdave


I am the registered proprietor in the United States of the trademark: Dangerdave. (Serial Number 75637813)

As you are aware, I have for many years provided legal adult material on the internet. As a result of my activities, the Dangerdave trademark has become extremely well known in the adult website space.


Your customer
